Dracon acknowledges Krhinos' word.

"I'm on it Captain," he says as he make=
s his way to the engine and control area.

After flicking around and double=
-checking the systems to  make sure everything is in order, he smiles.

"We=
're good to go," he reports.
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Nic 
 =
 To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Saturday, June 14, 2003 8:48 AM
  Subj=
ect: Re: StarDrill Corp.


  Krhinos: Thanks Rukus... (Helooks at the monit=
or) Dracon, the twenty
  cycles are up! Engage the engines when you're read=
y!

  --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Jeff" <x_rauq_x@y...> wrote:
  > --Ru=
kus--
  > 
  > Rukus grabbed the comm, "Good to go on your signal Krhinos. =
The bird 
  > shall fly." He preped the last of the timewarp engines, and e=
ngaged 
  > the power drives. The panel lit up with an all green, and the e=
ngine 
  > began to glow and hum.
  > 
  > 
  > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.c=
om, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
  > > Krhinos came up to a console an=
d entered the plot course in the 
  > computer.

erything good? Are you all ready?
